job.title: Software Engineer In Test
job.description:
Job Purpose
Sophos is seeking a talented, experienced Software Development Engineer in Test to join our Sophos Central team. As a member of the Sophos Central Software Development Engineer in Test team, you will be working directly with Development, UX, PM and other functional groups to ensure highest quality software development and releases for the Central product. We look forward to welcoming another fantastic member onto our team!
Main Duties
Ability to partner effectively with Development, UX, PM and other developers to design and implement meeting the spirit of Quality Engineering standards
Assist with writing and executing sound test cases against product features and functionality
Identifying and implementing process improvements for Quality Engineering efficiency
Participate in all phases of the SDLC from design to delivery on team projects
Write test automation code to deliver against project timescales, quality and requirements in various languages for Sophos Cloud products
Conduct technical presentations on Test Automation/Quality Engineering specific topics
Conduct Unit, System and Integration testing and fixing errors, with guidance if required
Define Test scenarios and Test cases to ensure quality of the team’s deliverables
Ability to identify major issues and escalate accordingly
Essential Skills
Thorough knowledge of an object-oriented programming language (Java, C#, and JavaScript)
Knowledge of web frameworks, such as Angular, ReactJS, NodeJS, and etc…
Expert knowledge of industry standard testing techniques and best practices
Very strong Quality Engineering skills in test execution, test planning, test case design, and test result reporting
Experience executing or writing Test Automation that performs actions such as: HTTP Requests/Responses, query of remote databases, access and execute commands on external systems/VMs.
Very strong verbal and written communication skills
Very strong troubleshooting skills
Good understanding of Linux or Unix Systems fundamentals
Good understanding of Networking fundamentals
Exposure to Cloud computing (AWS experience a plus)
Experience in Agile Scrum SDLC environment
Knowledge of Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment SDLC patterns
Strong multi-tasking skills and technical leadership skills
Requirements
5+ years of experience in a Test Automation role
2+ years of experience in a Quality Engineering role
